Trinity::

Still holding onto Archangle's back, she fired her small optic lazars 
at Ignatius.  Her tiny lazars would have been more of an annouyance 
than anything.  


- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Ratchet/Sideswipe/Arcangel/Sky Lynx:::
> 
> ::they hear the sounds of battle and run out::
> Ratchet: Bye-Bye Trainers!
> Sideswipe: You wont be chipping anyone today!
> ::Ratchet fires 8 shots from each blaster at Prebon, and Sideswipe 
fires 2 
> missles at Slayer.  Arcangel and Sky Lynx land and Arcangel fires 
25 shots at 
> Ignatius, and Sky Lynx fires 2 missles at Blaze::
